name: Fighting the Virus
description:
This game is a first-person shooter, your goal is to eliminate COVID-19 cells within an infected human body.

The game was created during corona quarantine. The main purpose of this game is to raise awareness about the corona virus in a gameified way. It is not to big but hopefully it can help you to kill some time while being isolated.

The game was created with the help of Unity FPS Creator, check Unitys Website, since all courses are currently free.

You can reach me via twitter (xNicolase) or here on itch.io
